alert.note: Alert for Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 8:01PM CST until December 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle and light freezing rain developing tonight into Tuesday morning. Snow developing Tuesday late afternoon into Wednesday morning. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
